about.summary: A modular active learning framework for Python3

name: modal
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "modAL" %}
{% set version = "0.3.5" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c7a24c7d498eb18a55100474fd792a693b0d6617dd4ebea121e2d8abf979fee9

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - numpy >=1.13
    - python
    - scikit-learn >=0.18
    - scipy >=0.18

test:
  imports:
    - modAL
    - modAL.models
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://pypi.org/project/modAL/
  summary: A modular active learning framework for Python3
  license: MIT
  # License requested to be included as part of package
  # https://github.com/modAL-python/modAL/issues/87
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hadim
